reviewText: Bob got a chance to draw tags for Elk in Arizona and took a monster bull, along with a hard-to-get Shiras Moose tag in Utah. It even includes a Canadian Moose hunt in British Columbia, along with Musk Ox and Polar Bear in the Arctic! From how cold it is up there, I hope to have plenty of clothes to keep warm if I did that.
I have met Bob Fromme a few times. He is an accomplished bow hunter and makes an awesome DVD. I recommend watching.
